metadata.title: CVE-2022-48782 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mctp: fix use after freeClang static analysis reports this problemroute.c:425:4: warning: Use of memory after it is freed  trace_mctp_key_acquire(key);  ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~When mctp_key_add() fails, key is freed but then is laterused in trace_mctp_key_acquire().  Add an else statementto use the key only when mctp_key_add() is successful.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
